title: Logic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to investigate. You learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you are meticulous with your kills. If you can guess the role of the player you kill, you clean them.
Kill Note Addition:
*The note is stained in blood. It also has an encrypted code of jumbled words and numbers. After decoding the message, it reads:*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4915
*Wield raw intellectual power. Deduce the world.*
